sentences.english: The goal is to be able to look at complex diseases like cancer.
sentences.chinese: 我們的目標是能夠診斷像癌症這樣的疑難雜症。

sentences.english: Many factors caused the Bangladesh well intervention to become a protracted struggle.
sentences.chinese: 許多因素導致孟加拉國水井事件拖成了疑難雜症。

sentences.english: Prajna Paramita is magic medicine that cures all kinds of puzzling and incurable diseases!
sentences.chinese: 般若波羅蜜多，是良藥，能醫治一切的疑難雜症。

sentences.english: We still have a lot of intractable diseases.
sentences.chinese: 我們還有很多的疑難雜症。

sentences.english: Many factors caused the Bangladesh well intervention to become a protracted struggle.
sentences.chinese: 許多因素導致孟加拉國水井事件拖成了疑難雜症。

sentences.english: At our core we have focused on solving difficult problems.
sentences.chinese: 我們關注於解決疑難雜症。

definition: (TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
hiding a sickness for fear of treatment (idiom); fig. concealing a fault to avoid criticism/to keep one's shortcomings secret/to refuse to listen to advice
to attend to the needs of (an invalid, disabled person etc)/caregiver
Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
to get rid of the old to bring in the new (idiom); to innovate
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)
